section.title: Description
section.para: A draggable zone of page, where it's possible to press a mouse button on the content and drag it to any drop zone. It encodes all necessary JavaScript code for supporting drag operations.

itemizedlist.listitem: Encodes all necessary JavaScript code for supporting drag operations in drag and drop
Drag zone supports all content inside that can be needed for Drag and Drop
Managing zones to drop components dragged from this zone with an attribute
Easy management of parameters to send to a target drop zone
